text:
TO: EXBGOTB7E COMMITTEE* RICKARD HULL, RALPH STEETLE.
FROMs HARRI J. SKCEHIA
DATEs DECEMBER 18 5 1953
Herewith recent notes from and to Goggin and Novlk. Hbuld you
agree to in-siting Novik and Goggin to join Director* s meeting
at Asaes in January for perhaps a half«day to plan strategy?
I think a meeting of Union officials with Goggin major Hmdk
should follow such a meeting.
To Hull and Steetle* Could you fill me in on results of your
last discussions on this? Looks like a problem w©8d better
more on as soon after the holidays as possible. Only question
is how.
